title: Red Potion
summaries: The Red Potion is a potion which can be found in Chests in drunk worlds (3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance), For the worthy worlds (10*1/10 (10%) chance) and Get fixed boi worlds. It can also be dropped by Jungle Mimics, which spawn in Celebrationmk10 and Get fixed boi worlds.

It inflicts a very large number of <linked>debuffs</linked> for 1 hour / <linked>2 hours</linked> / <linked>3 hours</linked> on players who consume it. In For the worthy and Get fixed boi, it instead grants up to three <linked>buffs</linked> for 30 minutes.

statistics.Tooltip: 'Only for those who are worthy'
